PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-08552016-09-30,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Film and Video Productions, 2016)
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (FILM AND VIDEO PRODUCTIONS, 2016) in order to (1) allow talk shows to be eligible for the Canadian Film or Video Production Tax Credit (CFVPTC); and (2) provide certainty for stakeholders on the eligibility of talk shows for the CFVPTC, and support a broader range of Canadian content productions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0262 Publication Date: 2016-10-19
AttachmentsAttachment
